fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Hold a vote for a player and their target(s) (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- All players are aware they must vote, the option with the highest amount of voted by the end of the day will occur
- Players will not know who will be affected by the option, ties will cause both options to occur
Options:
- They will be converted into Neutral scums
- They are attacked, power increasing by how many more players voted this than the second most voted option
- If one of them die, so will the others and all players who did not vote this
